General.Name: Spigen Korea Co. Ltd
General.Description: Spigen Korea Co., Ltd. operates as a life style design company in South Korea, North America, Europe, and internationally. It offers mobile cases, screen protectors, chargers, and other products. The company also operates ChangoSaver, an e-commerce fulfillment solution; AMZsaver, a logistics solution; and GoSelly for beauty products and contents. In addition, it offers its products through online. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
